pullRequest.body:
Prove the triangle removal lemma. Definitions that are internal to the proof are made private.

Co-authored-by: Bhavik Mehta, <bhavikmehta8@gmail.com>

---

The mathematical content all looks good here; definitions and statements agree with the literature, and the main result is a very useful tool in combinatorics - from the mathematical point of view this is ready to be merged.
It seems like a large part of this pr is unrelated refactoring. My personal preference would be to split out those changes into a preliminary pr.

Thanks!

maintainer merge

Thanks!

bors d+

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion rw [← dart_card_eq_twice_card_edges, ← card_univ] refine card_congr (fun d _ ↦ (d.fst, d.snd)) (by simp) (by simp [Dart.ext_iff, ← and_imp]) ?_ ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion triangleRemovalBound ε * card α ^ 3 ≤ (G.cliqueFinset 3).card := by ```
bound() here refers to the bound from the regularity lemma, would be good to indicate this in the documentation (in particular point out that the dependence is explicit, but terrible)
Please leave this as deprecated variant
Done in #12573

```suggestion
Copyright (c) 2024 Yaël Dillies, Bhavik Mehta. All rights reserved.
```

This code really was written in 2022 with minimal modifications since. Shouldn't the copyright be the time at which the code is written, not the one at which it is contributed to mathlib? In practice, both often coincide by at most a few months.
I don't know... but I am sure in practice it doesn't matter, let's keep 2022.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: Triangle removal
